cdcfluview 0.9.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

age_group_distribution()

Age Group Distribution of Influenza Positive Tests Reported by Public Health Laboratories

cdc_basemap()

Retrieve CDC U.S. Basemaps

cdcfluview

Retrieve Flu Season Data from the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ('CDC') 'FluView' Portal

census_regions

Census Region Table

geographic_spread()

State and Territorial Epidemiologists Reports of Geographic Spread of Influenza

get_flu_data()

Retrieves state, regional or national influenza statistics from the CDC (deprecated)

get_hosp_data()

Retrieves influenza hospitalization statistics from the CDC (deprecated)

get_state_data()

Retrieves state/territory-level influenza statistics from the CDC (deprecated)

get_weekly_flu_report()

Retrieves (high-level) weekly (XML) influenza surveillance report from the CDC

hhs_regions

HHS Region Table

hospitalizations()

Laboratory-Confirmed Influenza Hospitalizations

ili_weekly_activity_indicators()

Retrieve weekly state-level ILI indicators per-state for a given season

ilinet()

Retrieve ILINet Surveillance Data

mmwr_week()

Convert a Date to an MMWR day+week+year

mmwr_week_to_date()

Convert an MMWR year+week or year+week+day to a Date object

mmwr_weekday()

Convert a Date to an MMWR weekday

mmwrid_map

MMWR ID to Calendar Mappings

pi_mortality()

Pneumonia and Influenza Mortality Surveillance

state_data_providers()

Retrieve metadata about U.S. State CDC Provider Data

surveillance_areas()

Retrieve a list of valid sub-regions for each surveillance area.

who_nrevss()

Retrieve WHO/NREVSS Surveillance Data

  • All functions
